file_content.text: The shuttle's down! Pilot must've panicked during the escape.
My squad's heading to the crash site to look for survivors. Meet us there.
We're too late! The nobles got their hands on a shuttle! They're breaking the quarantine!
Major Byzal here. Got a situation developing. The nobles are getting desperate; they want off this world.
They're heading for the spaceport with their bodyguards. Figure they can fight through the rakghouls and get a ship.
We can't let them break quarantine. I'm sending my patrols to the spaceport. Meet us there.
